name: The Climb Out
description:
Short game made for Ludum Dare 49.

Jump on the scrolling platforms to the top to make it out of the pit. But be careful, the ledges are unstable and other creatures lurk above!

Rain / thunder: https://opengameart.org/content/rain-long-thunder

Jumping sound: https://opengameart.org/content/jump-landing-sound
